testcase.name: 'Simple Form Demo' Page Tests › Validate that the 'Your Message' field displays the correct text.
testcase.system-out: ==== START: Validate that the 'Your Message' field displays the correct text. [PASSED] ==== Step # 1: Navigate to 'https://www.lambdatest.com/selenium-playground/'. Step # 2: Click the 'Simple Form Demo' hyperlink. Step # 3: Validate that the user is successfully navigated to the 'simple-form-demo' page. Step # 4: Enter 'Welcome to LambdaTest' into the 'Enter Message' text box. Step # 5: Click the 'Get Checked Value' button. Step # 6: Validate that the 'Your Message:' field displays 'Welcome to LambdaTest'. Step # 7: Close browser. ==== END: Validate that the 'Your Message' field displays the correct text. [PASSED] ====

testcase.name: 'Drag & Drop Sliders' Page Tests › Validate that the slider value is successfully changed to value '95'.
testcase.system-out: ==== START: Validate that the slider value is successfully changed to value '95'. [PASSED] ==== Step # 1: Navigate to 'https://www.lambdatest.com/selenium-playground/'. Step # 2: Click the 'Drag & Drop Sliders' hyperlink. Step # 3: Change 'Default value 15' slider value to '95'. Step # 4: Validate that the 'Default value 15' slider box displays as '95'. Step # 5: Close browser. ==== END: Validate that the slider value is successfully changed to value '95'. [PASSED] ====

testcase.name: 'Input Form Submit' Page Tests › Validate that the 'Form Demo' page is successfully submitted.
testcase.system-out: ==== START: Validate that the 'Form Demo' page is successfully submitted. [PASSED] ==== Step # 1: Navigate to 'https://www.lambdatest.com/selenium-playground/'. Step # 2: Click the 'Input Form Submit' hyperlink. Step # 3: Click the 'Submit' button. Step # 4: Validate that the 'Please fill out this field' error message is displayed for the 'Name' field. Step # 5: Enter value into the 'Name' textbox. Step # 6: Enter value into the 'Email' textbox. Step # 7: Enter value into the 'Password' textbox. Step # 8: Enter value into the 'Company' textbox. Step # 9: Enter value into the 'Website' textbox. Step # 10: Enter value into the 'Country' textbox. Step # 11: Enter value into the 'City' textbox. Step # 12: Enter value into the 'Address 1' textbox. Step # 13: Enter value into the 'Address 2' textbox. Step # 14: Enter value into the 'State' textbox. Step # 15: Enter value into the 'Zip Code' textbox. Step # 16: Click the 'Submit' button. Step # 17: Validate that the 'Thanks for contacting us, we will get back to you shortly.' message is successfully displayed. Step # 18: Close browser. ==== END: Validate that the 'Form Demo' page is successfully submitted. [PASSED] ====
